clip.quote: Having an accountability partner increases your likelihood of being successful at your goal by 95%.
clip.why_clipworthy: This statistic is surprising and highlights the importance of accountability, making it a compelling point for viewers.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to boost your success rate by 95%? Here's how accountability can transform your business.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Want to boost your success rate by 95%? Here's how accountability can transform your business.",
    "SETUP": "In today's fast-paced real estate market, staying ahead is crucial. But did you know that having an accountability partner can skyrocket your success?",
    "INSIGHT": "Kim Rittberg shares a surprising statistic: having an accountability partner increases your likelihood of achieving your goals by 95%. This isn't just about having someone to check in with; it's about creating a support system that keeps you motivated and focused.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "Imagine applying this to your real estate business. Whether it's leveraging video content or enhancing your social media presence, an accountability partner can help you stay on track and build confidence.",
    "CTA": "So, who will be your accountability partner? Start your journey today and watch your success soar. Comment below with your thoughts!"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Boost your success by 95% with an accountability partner! #RealEstateTips",
  "HASHTAGS": ["#RealEstateSuccess", "#Accountability", "#BusinessGrowth", "#VideoMarketing", "#SocialMediaStrategy"],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "top_producer_secrets"
}
```
